tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientHealthData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight FLOAT,
    height FLOAT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
    heart_rate INT,
    potential_health_risks TEXT,
    last_checkup_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRisks (
  risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  risk_factor VARCHAR(50),
  risk_level VARCHAR(20),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  condition_id INT,
  alert_message TEXT,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    height DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE health_conditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
    condition_name VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE risk_factors (
    risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
    risk_factor_name VARCHAR(50),
    risk_level VARCHAR(20),
    last_updated DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    blood_type VARCHAR(5)
)

CREATE TABLE health_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    prescription VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
    sign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE risk_factors (
    factor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    risk_factor VARCHAR(50),
    risk_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    alert_message VARCHAR(150),
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
